daily_fact: Stay engaged with your community through local news and civic participation.
topline_md: Recent updates in NYC include the first measles case in an unvaccinated infant, a winter storm forecast for Staten Island, and a guilty plea in a plot to assassinate a U.S. citizen, alongside ongoing discussions about housing shortages and public safety concerns.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
risks_alerts.summary_md:
### Risks & Alerts

- NYC reports first measles case in an unvaccinated infant who traveled overseas. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Wintry mix expected on Staten Island overnight; prepare for possible travel disruptions. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
